title: Drawing, "Shelving unit", ca. 1929–30
medium: Graphite and orange color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right: SCALE 1"=1'0"/DONALD DESKEY/145.WEST 57.STR,/NEW YORK CITY.; lower left: ELEVATION & SECTION/BOOK SHELVES; lower left margin: 9; inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P; dimensions and materials in graphite and orange color pencil
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for verical shelving unit. Three shelves and right side of unit in red lacquer; base, left side and top in dark walnut.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Shelving unit", ca. 1929–30.
ca. 1929–30. Graphite and orange color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-881.
